diagrams.description: A detailed flowchart illustrating the management and values of national parks.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    NationalParks[National Parks] --> Conservation[Conservation]
    NationalParks --> Recreation[Public Enjoyment]
    NationalParks --> Management[Management]
    Conservation --> Natural[Natural Resource Protection]
    Conservation --> Cultural[Cultural Resource Preservation]
    Recreation --> VisitorServices[Visitor Services]
    Recreation --> Education[Education]
    Management --> Resource[Resource Management]
    Management --> Infrastructure[Infrastructure]
